<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fortify Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=2570) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839)

</column>

---

You reinforce your shield with a rocky outgrowth of metal and stone. You [Raise your Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98). If you use the Shield Block reaction before your next turn, add your character level to your shield's Hardness when determining how much damage is blocked.
name: Fortify Shield
